channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【Consistency and Partition Tolerance: Understanding CAP vs PACELC】一致性和分区耐受性：理解上限与PACELC
item.description: 【In this article, we will look at these two models as they apply to real-world database design and understand the various trade-offs involved.】在本文中，我们将研究这两个模型，因为它们适用于现实世界数据库设计，并了解所涉及的各种权衡。

item.title: 【How Nubank Uses AI Models to Analyze Transaction Data for 100M Users】Nubank如何使用AI模型分析100m用户的交易数据
item.description: 【Nubank adopted a foundation model-based approach, which has already been transforming domains like natural language processing and computer vision.】Nubank采用了一种基于基础模型的方法，该方法已经在改变自然语言处理和计算机视觉等领域。

item.title: 【Top Leader Election Algorithms in Distributed Databases】分布式数据库中的顶级领导者选举算法
item.description: 【A database needs to be sure about who the leader is at any given time, that the leader is sufficiently up to date, and that a new leader can be chosen quickly and safely when necessary.】数据库需要确保在任何给定时间的领导者是谁，领导者足够最新的，并且可以在必要时快速，安全地选择新的领导者。

item.title: 【EP173: BIGGEST Mistakes to Avoid in System Design Interviews】EP173：系统设计采访中要避免的最大错误
item.description: 【MCP (Model Context Protocol) is an open standard that simplifies how AI models, particularly LLMs, interact with external data sources, tools, and services.】MCP（模型上下文协议）是一个开放标准，可以简化AI模型，尤其是LLMS，与外部数据源，工具和服务的交互方式。

item.title: 【A Guide to Database Sharding: Key Strategies】数据库碎片指南：关键策略
item.description: 【This article looks at the fundamentals of database sharding. We cover details like why it matters, how it works, and what trade-offs come with it. We’ll walk through common sharding strategies and practical engineering considerations.】本文着眼于数据库碎片的基础。我们涵盖了详细信息，例如它的重要性，运作方式以及随之而来的权衡。我们将介绍常见的碎片策略和实践工程考虑。

item.title: 【EP172: Top 5 common ways to improve API performance】EP172：提高API性能的前5种常见方法
item.description: 【What other ways do you use to improve API performance?】您还使用哪些其他方法来提高API性能？

item.title: 【How LLMs See the World】LLM如何看世界
item.description: 【Tokens are what rule the world of LLMs. You send tokens to models, you pay by the token, and models read, understand, and breathe tokens.】令牌是统治LLM的世界。您将令牌发送到模型，由代币付款，模型读取，理解和呼吸令牌。

item.title: 【EP174: 16 Coding Patterns That Make Interviews Easy】EP174：16种使访谈变得容易的编码模式
item.description: 【Which other coding pattern will you add to the list?】您还将添加哪些其他编码模式？

item.title: 【How Tinder’s API Gateway Handles A Billion Swipes Per Day】Tinder的API门户每天如何处理十亿美元
item.description: 【Tinder operates globally. Real user traffic pours in from over 190 countries. So does bad traffic that includes bots, scrapers, and abuse attempts.】火种在全球运作。真正的用户流量来自190多个国家 /地区。包括机器人，刮板和滥用尝试的不良流量也是如此。

item.title: 【How Cursor Serves Billions of AI Code Completions Every Day】光标如何每天为数十亿个AI代码完成服务
item.description: 【In this article, we will take a look at the key features of Cursor, how those features work, and the infrastructure stack that powers it.】在本文中，我们将查看光标的关键功能，这些功能的工作方式以及为其提供动力的基础架构堆栈。
